name: Bandersnatch In a Nutshell
description:
To be honest, this is little more than an exercise in using Ren'Py. But if you wonder, what is Black Mirror: Bandersnatch in a nutshell, you can give my project a try.

WARNING: At this point, I still haven't finished this game, but I intend to before the deadline. And hope I won't kill anyone to do that.
